short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CorgiAI allows you to use AI directly from within the page you're browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CorgiAI makes AI easy convenient and easy to use to use no matter what website you're on without copy-pasting, and without switching tabs.

CorgiAI saves you time by allowing you to highlight any text on the screen and: 

Use CorgiAI to explain the meaning.
Use CorgiAI to help you reword, proofread, or re-write it.
Use CorgiAI to translate it. 
Use CorgiAI to summarize it. 

CorgiAI is powered by ChatGPT, so open the chat interface directly in the page you're viewing and prompt Super with any question or prompts that you'd like.
